roleset.name: to set off or start, again

example.name: All args
example.text: So Seita-1 has introduced blonde cigarettes under the Gauloises label , and intends PRO-1 to relaunch the unsuccessful Gitanes Blondes in new packaging , similar to the slide - packs used by brown - tobacco Gitanes .
example.arg: in new packaging , similar to the slide - packs used by brown - tobacco Gitanes

roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in wsj-nw. Framed by Claire; comparison to launch.01.
